attributes.action: Scrap the plan to collect and store lifestyle information in order to re-band council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The collection of lifestyle information as part of a council tax re-banding scheme infringes a basic Human Right  “Right to respect for private and family life”  incorporated in UK law.

“…… you should always think carefully before supplying your personal information. Always ask why an organisation is requesting it, as you may not need to supply it.”  Source - Information Commissioner’s Office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
